Well do

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 28, 2011, at=
 5:40 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Yep. Straight =
Shot is a basic, so is Rat Trap. Even when Rat Trap
> became transmetal and=
 despite the fact that he was listed as a Deluxe,
> in the show he never ac=
tually grew. So he would be between 5 and 6
> feet tall. The show bible say=
s 5'
> 
> However having said that I am instituting something that the show=
 did
> but that we forgot.
> 
> BW's characters do not size change.
> 
> Fo=
r instance Rat Trap was about 5 feet tall as a robot and he turned
> into a=
 rat of approximately the same size. If you noticed in the
> cartoon he is =
much larger than your average rat. Transmetal Megatron
> was about 10 feet =
tall and he turned into a 10 tall T-rex, which is
> much smaller than the r=
eal world counter parts.
> 
> What that means is that Rat Trap will not be =
small enough to climb
> inside walls or Windlord as he is a Deluxe size no =
matter if robot or
> bird (approximate 7' or so).
> 
> Anyways, I know we a=
llowed it before, but I am attempting to keep us
> as close to the Beast Wa=
rs feel of things as is possible. This is just
> food for thought as things=
 get more intense later.
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-60--888787660

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Well do<br><br>Perpetually on the move=
 and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Aug 28, 2011, at 5:40 PM, Supe=
r Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">supercyclonus@gma=
il.com</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><di=
v>




<span style=3D"display:none"> </span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-te=
xt">
      
      
      <p>Yep. Straight Shot is a basic, so is Rat Trap. =
Even when Rat Trap<br>
became transmetal and despite the fact that he was l=
isted as a Deluxe,<br>
in the show he never actually grew. So he would be b=
etween 5 and 6<br>
feet tall. The show bible says 5'<br>
<br>
However havin=
g said that I am instituting something that the show did<br>
but that we fo=
rgot.<br>
<br>
BW's characters do not size change.<br>
<br>
For instance Ra=
t Trap was about 5 feet tall as a robot and he turned<br>
into a rat of app=
roximately the same size. If you noticed in the<br>
cartoon he is much larg=
er than your average rat. Transmetal  Megatron<br>
was about 10 feet tall a=
nd he turned into a 10 tall T-rex, which is<br>
much smaller than the real =
world counter parts.<br>
<br>
What that means is that Rat Trap will not be =
small enough to climb<br>
inside walls or Windlord as he is a Deluxe size n=
o matter if robot or<br>
bird (approximate 7' or so).<br>
<br>
Anyways, I k=
now we allowed it before, but I am attempting to keep us<br>
as close to th=
e Beast Wars feel of things as is possible. This is just<br>
food for thoug=
ht as things get more intense later.<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
</p>

    </div=
